actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing Committees of the House.

summary.text: Elects the following Representatives to certain House committees: (1) Marjorie S. Holt of Maryland to the Committee on the District of Columbia; (2) Guy V. Molinari of New York to the Committee on Small Business; (3) Douglas K. Bereuter of Nebraska to the Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs; (4) and Mark Siljander of Michigan to the Committees on Small Business and Veterans' Affairs.

titles.title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing Committees of the House.
